items.name: Dawncore
items.desc: Reduce the holder's max Mana by 10. Subsequent spellcasts reduce max Mana by 10%, to a minimum of 15.

items.name: Accomplice's Gloves
items.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

items.name: Adaptive Helm
items.desc:
Gain an additional 15% Mana from all sources. The wearer gains an additional bonus based on their Role:

Tanks and Fighters: Gain 35 Armor and Magic Resistance.

Other Roles: Gain 15 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

items.name: Aegis of the Legion
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant 25% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies in the same row, and all allies behind them for 12 seconds.

[Support item]

items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
items.desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

items.name: Banshee's Veil
items.desc:
Combat start: Grant the holder and allies within 1 hexes in the same row immunity to crowd control and 25% Attack Speed for 18 seconds.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Bastion Emblem
items.desc:
The holder gains the Bastion trait.
Gain 15% of Armor as Attack Damage.
Gain 15% of Magic Resistance as Ability Power.

items.name: B.F. Sword
items.desc: %i:scaleAD% +10% Attack Damage

items.name: Blacksmith's Gloves
items.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn Artifacts.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

items.desc: Dealing magic damage reduces the target's Magic Resist by 4. If their Magic Resist is 0, grant the holder 5 Mana instead.

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.desc: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

items.desc: Gain 10% additional Attack Damage and Ability Power from all sources.

Attacks deal an additional 60% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage and heal the holder for the damage dealt.

The holder cannot cast their Ability or gain Mana.

When the Shield expires, gain 25 Ability Power.

items.desc:
Grant %i:scaleAS% 1% bonus Attack Speed per %i:goldCoins% gold in your bank (up to %i:goldCoins% 30 gold).

Each attack has a 5% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

- 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
- 12% Omnivamp.

items.desc:
The holder gains the Protector trait.
When a shield on the holder breaks, heal the holder and the nearest ally for 20% of the shield's initial value.

items.name: Crystalline Reinforcements
items.desc: Your team gains 1000 health. Whenever a unit dies, a crystalline copy one star level lower joins the fight!

items.name: Zz'Rot Portal
items.desc:
Combat start: Taunt.
On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. The Voidspawn has massively reduced effectiveness when created by a summoned unit.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter

items.name: Determined Investor
items.desc: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and %i:goldCoins% 5 gold.
